name: Neon Rooms
description:
This is a small game demo of a larger concept that was completed for the Amaze Me 2021 GMS2 Game Jam.

Controls

Movement: left and right arrow keys

Jump: Space

Shooting: Z

Music

The amazing music was created by the incredibly talented artist allie elle. Please go check out their other tracks on Soundcloud!

https://soundcloud.com/alex-lamont-64776458

Art Credits

Enemies and Tileset: https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset

Player sprite: https://oco.itch.io/cyberpunk-character-pack
